title: Chanel No. 5
description: A timeless fragrance with notes of jasmine, rose, and sandalwood.

title: Dior Sauvage
description: A fresh and spicy scent with notes of Calabrian bergamot and Sichuan pepper.

title: Yves Saint Laurent Libre
description: A modern floral fragrance with notes of lavender, orange blossom, and musk.

title: Creed Aventus
description: A bold fragrance with notes of pineapple, birch, and musk.

title: Gucci Bloom
description: A delicate floral scent with notes of jasmine, tuberose, and Rangoon creeper.

title: Tom Ford Black Orchid
description: A rich, sensual fragrance with black orchid, vanilla, and patchouli.

title: Givenchy Dahlia Divin
description: A luxurious floral fragrance with notes of jasmine, sandalwood, and amber.

title: Armani Si
description: A sophisticated fragrance with notes of black currant, rose, and vanilla.

title: Viktor & Rolf Flowerbomb
description: A sweet floral fragrance with notes of jasmine, orange blossom, and patchouli.

title: Hermes Twilly
description: A spicy floral fragrance with notes of ginger, tuberose, and sandalwood.
